searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT distinct(T.CASE_CODE), BA_NAME, AGENT_NAME, (select top 1 UU.MOBILE from SCTRANS.SYS_USER UU where UU.USERNAME=AGENT_USERNAME)AGENT_MOBILE, GRP_NAME as AGENT_ORG_NAME, (select top 1 UU.real_name from SCTRANS.SYS_USER UU where UU.ID=T.LEADING_PROCESS_ID) SPONSOR, (select top 1 vj.real_name from SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB VJ left join SCTRANS.ACT_HI_TASKINST AHT on aht.ASSIGNEE_=VJ.USERNAME where AHT.TASK_DEF_KEY_ ='Guohu' and t.INST_CODE=AHT.PROC_INST_ID_) GUOHU_REAL_NAME, (select top 1 org2.ORG_NAME orgName1 from sctrans.sys_org org1 left join sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB uoj on org1.ID=uoj.ORG_ID left join sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB uoj1 on org1.PARENT_ID=uoj1.ORG_ID left join sctrans.SYS_ORG org2 on org2.ID=uoj1.ORG_ID where org1.PARENT_ID in ( 'FF5BC56E0E4B45289DAA5721A494C7C5', '8a8493d453141f3301532c9568011af9', 'd5878adf8b0c4032aeae895c701ed693', 'de81a98a8ec341caa8e9bc77c46cd370', '54b3233fdf994d9987e7c8febc223588', '960089538bc54a9a9139ef52ceb45b33', '6114AB949B4445828D4383977C4FAC71', '6a84979158b942b78a8a5921cc30b8c3') and org1.ID=(select top 1 vj.ORG_ID from SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB VJ left join SCTRANS.ACT_HI_TASKINST AHT on aht.ASSIGNEE_=VJ.USERNAME where AHT.TASK_DEF_KEY_ ='Guohu' and t.INST_CODE=AHT.PROC_INST_ID_) ) GUOHU_ORG_NAME,
case WHEN T.SQUARE = 0 then ROUND(CONVERT(float,s.REAL_PRICE)/CONVERT(float,1),2) ELSE ROUND(CONVERT(float,s.REAL_PRICE)/ISNULL(CONVERT(float,T.SQUARE),1),2) END GUOHUDJ, (select TOP 1 PM.dist_name from SCTRANS.T_TS_PR_RESEARCH_MAP PM WHERE T.DIST_CODE=PM.dist_code)AS dist_name , CTM_CODE, M.CUST_NAME, STUFF((SELECT ';'+D.NAME FROM sctrans.SYS_DICT D WHERE D.CODE = M.MORT_TYPE AND D.TYPE ='30016' for xml path('')),1,1,'') AS MORT_TYPE_NAME,
STUFF((SELECT ';'+D.NAME FROM sctrans.SYS_DICT D WHERE D.CODE in (SELECT EC.LOAN_SRV_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE EC WHERE EC.CASE_CODE=T.CASE_CODE AND EC.LOAN_SRV_CODE NOT IN ('30004005','30004015')) AND D.TYPE='yu_serv_cat_code_tree' AND (D.TAG LIKE '%Eloan%' or D.TAG LIKE '%eplus%') for xml path('')),1,1,'') AS ELOAN_PRO_TYPE, (SELECT SUM(EC.APPLY_AMOUNT) FROM sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE EC where EC.CASE_CODE = T.CASE_CODE AND EC.LOAN_SRV_CODE NOT IN ('30004005','30004015')) ELOAN_APPLYAMOUNT_COUNT,
STUFF((SELECT ';'+D.NAME FROM sctrans.SYS_DICT D WHERE D.CODE in (SELECT EC.LOAN_SRV_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE EC WHERE EC.CASE_CODE=T.CASE_CODE AND EC.LOAN_SRV_CODE IN ('30004005','30004015')) AND D.TYPE='yu_serv_cat_code_tree' AND (D.TAG LIKE '%Eloan%' or D.TAG LIKE '%eplus%') for xml path('')),1,1,'') AS ELOAN_PRO_TYPE_KA, STUFF((SELECT ';'+CAST(EC.APPLY_AMOUNT as varchar) FROM sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE EC WHERE EC.CASE_CODE=T.CASE_CODE AND EC.LOAN_SRV_CODE IN ('30004005','30004015') for xml path('')),1,1,'') AS ELOAN_APPLYAMOUNT_COUNT_STRING,
(SELECT SUM(G.EVAL_FEE) FROM sctrans.T_TO_EVA_FEE_RECORD G where G.CASE_CODE=T.CASE_CODE) EVAL_FEE, (select TOP 1 GI.GUEST_PHONE from SCTRANS.T_TG_GUEST_INFO GI where GI.PKID IN (SELECT CUST_CODE FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M WHERE T.case_code=m.CASE_CODE)) AS GUEST_PHONE, PROPERTY_ADDR , ROUND(CONVERT(float,S.CON_PRICE)/10000,2) AS CON_PRICE, (select TOP 1 TF.FIN_ORG_NAME FROM SCTRANS.T_TS_FIN_ORG TF WHERE TF.FIN_ORG_CODE=M.FIN_ORG_CODE ) FIN_ORG_NAME, (select TOP 1 TF.FIN_ORG_NAME_YC FROM SCTRANS.T_TS_FIN_ORG TF WHERE TF.FIN_ORG_CODE=M.FIN_ORG_CODE ) FIN_ORG_NAME_YC,
LOAN_REQ, AGENT_USERNAME, T.PKID, SQUARE, DIST_CODE, T.REAL_NAME , T.ORG_NAME, transferDate, caseTransferDate , status, AR_NAME , QJDS_NAME AS VREAL_NAME, ROUND(CONVERT(float,M.COM_AMOUNT)/10000,2) COM_AMOUNT, ROUND(CONVERT(float,M.PRF_AMOUNT)/10000,2) PRF_AMOUNT, M.COM_DISCOUNT COM_DISCOUNT, ROUND(CONVERT(float,(M.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT))/10000,2) as ACCOUNT, M.LOANER_NAME LOANER_NAME, M.loanlost_apply_reason as loanlost_apply_reason_old, M.SELF_DEL_REASON, case when M.IS_LOANER_ARRIVE = 1 then '是' when M.IS_LOANER_ARRIVE = 0 then '否' end IS_LOANER_ARRIVE,
case when T.LOAN_REQ=1 and M.MORT_TYPE in('30016001','30016002') and M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI =1 then '收单' when T.LOAN_REQ=1 and M.MORT_TYPE in('30016001','30016002') and M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI =0 then '流失' end SDSTATUS ,
(select TOP 1 U.REAL_NAME from SCTRANS.SYS_USER U where U.ID=(select top 1 OPERATOR from sctrans.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD ar1 where ar1.PART_CODE='GuohuApprove' and ar1.case_code=T.CASE_CODE order by ar1.OPERATOR_TIME)) AS ASSESSOR, (select top 1 ar2.CONTENT from sctrans.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD ar2 where ar2.PART_CODE='GuohuApprove' and ar2.case_code=t.CASE_CODE order by ar2.OPERATOR_TIME desc) AS CONTENT, (select top 1 ar3.NOT_APPROVE from sctrans.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD ar3 where ar3.PART_CODE='GuohuApprove' and ar3.case_code=t.CASE_CODE order by ar3.OPERATOR_TIME desc) AS NOT_APPROVE,
(select TOP 1 HT.REAL_HT_TIME FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER HT WHERE HT.CASE_CODE= T.CASE_CODE ) REAL_HT_TIME, (select TOP 1 AT.START_TIME_ FROM sctrans.[ACT_HI_TASKINST] AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_='Guohu' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_=(SELECT TOP 1 TW.INST_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW TW WHERE TW.CASE_CODE=T.CASE_CODE AND TW.BUSINESS_KEY = 'operation_process' and TW.STATUS in (0, 4) )) AS START_TIME
from ( select C.PKID,C.CASE_CODE,C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID,C.CTM_CODE ,C.LOAN_REQ, P.PROPERTY_ADDR ,P.SQUARE,P.DIST_CODE, ZG.REAL_NAME, ZG.ORG_NAME, I.AR_NAME, I.GRP_CODE,I.GRP_NAME, I.AGENT_NAME,I.AGENT_USERNAME,W.INST_CODE, (select TOP 1 AT.END_TIME_ FROM sctrans.[ACT_HI_TASKINST] AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_='Guohu' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_=(SELECT TOP 1 TW.INST_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW TW WHERE TW.CASE_CODE=C.CASE_CODE AND TW.BUSINESS_KEY = 'operation_process' and TW.STATUS in (0, 4) )) transferDate, (select TOP 1 AT.END_TIME_ FROM sctrans.[ACT_HI_TASKINST] AT WHERE AT.TASK_DEF_KEY_='GuohuApprove' AND AT.PROC_INST_ID_=(SELECT TOP 1 TW.INST_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW TW WHERE TW.CASE_CODE=C.CASE_CODE AND TW.BUSINESS_KEY = 'operation_process' and TW.STATUS in (0, 4) )) caseTransferDate, v.long_ AS status, i.BA_NAME, I.QJDS_NAME
from sctrans.T_TO_CASE C inner join sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO P on C.CASE_CODE = P.CASE_CODE left join sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB_ACTIVE ZG on C.ORG_ID = ZG.ORG_ID and ZG.JOB_CODE ='manager' inner join sctrans.T_TO_CASE_info I on C.CASE_CODE = I.CASE_CODE inner join sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW W on C.CASE_CODE = W.CASE_CODE and W.BUSINESS_KEY = 'operation_process' and W.STATUS in (0, 4) inner join sctrans.act_hi_varinst V on V.PROC_INST_ID_ = W.INST_CODE AND V.NAME_='GuohuApprove' ) T inner join SCTRANS.T_TO_SIGN S ON T.CASE_CODE = S.CASE_CODE --up is result down is new left join sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE M on T.CASE_CODE = M.CASE_CODE and M.IS_ACTIVE=1 and M.LAST_LOAN_BANK is not null where 1=1 <ifNotNull caseTransferDateStart> AND caseTransferDate > #caseTransferDateStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull caseTransferDateEnd> AND caseTransferDate < #caseTransferDateEnd# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull transferDateStart> AND transferDate > #transferDateStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull transferDateEnd> AND transferDate < #transferDateEnd# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull caseCode> AND T.CASE_CODE = #caseCode# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull orgName> AND T.ORG_NAME like '%' + #orgName# + '%' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull TransferStatus> AND status = #TransferStatus# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull vrealName> AND WZ.REAL_NAME like '%' + #vrealName# + '%' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull managerName> AND T.REAL_NAME like '%' + #managerName# + '%' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull propertyAddr> AND PROPERTY_ADDR like '%' + #propertyAddr# + '%' </ifNotNull>

column.name: ELOAN_APPLYAMOUNT_COUNT
column.title: E+金融产品申请总金额(万元)

searchSql.baseSql: SELECT org_name as ORGNAME,AMOUNT,NOT_APPROVE,(AMOUNT-NOT_APPROVE) APPROVE, (CASE WHEN AMOUNT>0 THEN CONCAT(NOT_APPROVE*100/AMOUNT,'%') ELSE '0%' END) RATE FROM ( SELECT org.org_name,COUNT(ar.PKID) AMOUNT,COUNT((CASE WHEN CONTENT LIKE '不通过,%' THEN 1 ELSE null end)) NOT_APPROVE FROM sctrans.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD ar LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE c ON ar.CASE_CODE = c.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_ORG org ON c.ORG_ID = org.id WHERE ar.PART_CODE = 'GuohuApprove' <ifNotNull serviceDepId> AND c.ORG_ID =#serviceDepId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull startDate> AND ar.OPERATOR_TIME >=#startDate# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull endDate> AND ar.OPERATOR_TIME <#endDate# </ifNotNull> GROUP BY org.org_name ) t2

SELECT org_name as ORGNAME,AMOUNT,NOT_APPROVE,(AMOUNT-NOT_APPROVE) APPROVE, (CASE WHEN AMOUNT>0 THEN CONCAT(NOT_APPROVE*100/AMOUNT,'%') ELSE '0%' END) RATE FROM ( SELECT org.org_name,COUNT(ar.PKID) AMOUNT,COUNT((CASE WHEN CONTENT LIKE '不通过,%' THEN 1 ELSE null end)) NOT_APPROVE FROM sctrans.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD ar LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE c ON ar.CASE_CODE = c.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_ORG org ON c.DISTRICT_ID = org.id WHERE ar.PART_CODE = 'GuohuApprove' <ifNotNull serviceDepId> AND c.DISTRICT_ID =#serviceDepId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull startDate> AND ar.OPERATOR_TIME >=#startDate# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull endDate> AND ar.OPERATOR_TIME <#endDate# </ifNotNull> GROUP BY org.org_name ) t2 where ORG_NAME is not null

SELECT CASE WHEN GROUPING(j.ORG_NAME) = 1 THEN '合计' ELSE j.ORG_NAME end as orgName, sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE 'reason1,%' OR NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%,reason1,%' OR NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason1 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason2%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason2 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason3%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason3 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason4%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason4 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason5%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason5 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason6%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason6 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason7%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason7 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason8%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason8 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason9%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason9 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason10%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason10 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason11%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason11 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason12%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason12 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason13%' OR NOT_APPROVE IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason13 FROM sctrans.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD t left join sctrans.T_TO_CASE c on t.CASE_CODE=c.CASE_CODE left join sctrans.SYS_ORG j on c.ORG_ID=j.ID WHERE CONTENT LIKE '不通过,%' AND PART_CODE = 'GuohuApprove' <ifNotNull serviceDepId> AND c.ORG_ID =#serviceDepId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull startDate> AND OPERATOR_TIME >=#startDate# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull endDate> AND OPERATOR_TIME <#endDate# </ifNotNull>

column.name: reason8
column.title: 贷款情况有误（有贷款、无贷款）

column.name: reason9
column.title: 贷款类型未选择/有误（纯商贷、组合贷、纯公积金）

column.name: reason10
column.title: 附件照片缺少/有误（物业地址不符、模糊不清、缺少重要附件）

searchSql.baseSql: SELECT CASE WHEN GROUPING(j.ORG_NAME) = 1 THEN '合计' ELSE j.ORG_NAME end as orgName, sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE 'reason1,%' OR NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%,reason1,%' OR NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason1 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason2%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason2 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason3%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason3 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason4%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason4 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason5%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason5 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason6%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason6 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason7%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason7 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason8%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason8 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason9%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason9 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason10%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason10 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason11%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason11 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason12%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason12 ,sum((CASE WHEN NOT_APPROVE LIKE '%reason13%' OR NOT_APPROVE IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) reason13 FROM sctrans.T_TO_APPROVE_RECORD t left join sctrans.T_TO_CASE c on t.CASE_CODE=c.CASE_CODE left join sctrans.SYS_ORG j on c.DISTRICT_ID=j.ID WHERE CONTENT LIKE '不通过,%' AND PART_CODE = 'GuohuApprove' <ifNotNull serviceDepId> AND c.DISTRICT_ID =#serviceDepId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull startDate> AND OPERATOR_TIME >=#startDate# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull endDate> AND OPERATOR_TIME <#endDate# </ifNotNull> and c.DISTRICT_ID is not null

column.name: reason8
column.title: 贷款情况有误（有贷款、无贷款）

column.name: reason9
column.title: 贷款类型未选择/有误（纯商贷、组合贷、纯公积金）

column.name: reason10
column.title: 附件照片缺少/有误（物业地址不符、模糊不清、缺少重要附件）

column.name: reason2
column.title: 客户资质差、征信有问题

column.name: reason3
column.title: 客户亲戚、朋友在银行上班

column.name: reason5
column.title: 客户自己找的银行优惠折扣大

column.name: reason6
column.title: 客户不愿意支付评估费

column.name: reason8
column.title: 房东坚持客户到他指定银行办理

column.name: reason9
column.title: 房龄老、面积小等不予受理案件

column.name: reason12
column.title: 分行原因导致案件流失
